#summary A powerful OSD Tool Set.

= ArduCAM OSD Config =

Thanks to Michael Oborne, now we have now an incredible customization and an the easiest setup of all ArduCAM OSD's resources.<br>
With ArduCAM OSD Config you can do all the job in just one place.<br>
Everything, from update firmware or charset to enable/disable and positioning all the panels.

http://arducam-osd.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/config_imgs/front.jpg

== Select and Drag Panels ==
Just click on a panel an drag it from its upper-left corner to positioning. Easy, eh!?

http://arducam-osd.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/config_imgs/drag.jpg
